front.title: MIKEYv2: SRTP Key Management using MIKEY, revisited

abstract.t: We specify a new version of the Multimedia Internet Keying (MIKEY) protocol, MIKEYv2, tailored for the secure real-time transport protocol (SRTP). MIKEYv2 uses the same payloads and message formats as MIKEY; it supports mode negotiation, uses either SDP in the signaling path or UDP for transport, does not require time synchronization, and does not need SIP support for accessing end- point credentials.
